ConfigItem.Name: ProductName
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the name of the application, shown in the web interface, tabs and title bar of the web browser.

ConfigItem.Name: ProductIcon
ConfigItem.Description: The icon file to be used as favicon (relative to Frontend::ImagePath).

ConfigItem.Name: AgentLogo
ConfigItem.Description: The logo shown in the header of the agent interface. The URL to the image must be a relative URL to the skin image directory.

ConfigItem.Name: CustomerLogo
ConfigItem.Description: The logo shown in the header of the customer interface. The URL to the image must be a relative URL to the skin image directory.

ConfigItem.Name: PDF::LogoFile
ConfigItem.Description: Specifies the path of the file for the logo in the page header (gif|jpg|png, 700 x 100 pixel).

ConfigItem.Name: DefaultLanguage
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the default front-end language. All the possible values are determined by the available language files on the system (see the next setting).

ConfigItem.Name: DefaultUsedLanguages
ConfigItem.Description: Defines all the languages that are available to the application. Specify only English names of languages here.

ConfigItem.Name: DefaultUsedLanguagesNative
ConfigItem.Description: Defines all the languages that are available to the application. Specify only native names of languages here.

ConfigItem.Name: Organization
ConfigItem.Description: Company name which will be included in outgoing emails as an X-Header.

ConfigItem.Name: CustomerHeadline
ConfigItem.Description: The headline shown in the customer interface.

ConfigItem.Name: SessionName
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the name of the session key. E.g. Session, SessionID or KIX.

ConfigItem.Name: CustomerPanelSessionName
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the name of the key for customer sessions.

ConfigItem.Name: Package::RepositoryRoot
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the location to get online repository list for additional packages. The first available result will be used.

ConfigItem.Name: Package::RepositoryList
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the list of online repositories. Another installations can be used as repository, for example: Key="http://example.com/otrs/public.pl?Action=PublicRepository;File=" and Content="Some Name".

ConfigItem.Name: Package::EventModulePost###99-SupportDataSend
ConfigItem.Description: Package event module file a scheduler task for update registration.

ConfigItem.Name: Package::ShowFeatureAddons
ConfigItem.Description: Toggles display of OTRS FeatureAddons list in PackageManager.

ConfigItem.Name: Package::ConfigureCallHomeVerificationPath
ConfigItem.Description: Enables the unrequested automatic communication of installed packages and other system details to the path.

ConfigItem.Name: CloudServices::Disabled
ConfigItem.Description: Disables the communication between this system and OTRS Group servers that provides cloud services. If active, some functionality will be lost such as system registration, support data sending, upgrading to and use of OTRS Business Solution™, OTRS Verify™, OTRS News and product News dashboard widgets, among others.

ConfigItem.Name: Frontend::NotifyModule###100-CloudServicesDisabled
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the module to display a notification if cloud services are disabled.

ConfigItem.Name: Frontend::RichText::EnhancedMode
ConfigItem.Description: Defines if the enhanced mode should be used (enables use of table, replace, subscript, superscript, paste from word, etc.).

ConfigItem.Name: PreferencesGroups###Skin
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the config parameters of this item, to be shown in the preferences view.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Responsible
ConfigItem.Description: Enables ticket responsible feature, to keep track of a specific ticket.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Type
ConfigItem.Description: Allows defining new types for ticket (if ticket type feature is enabled).

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Service
ConfigItem.Description: Allows defining services and SLAs for tickets (e. g. email, desktop, network, ...), and escalation attributes for SLAs (if ticket service/SLA feature is enabled).

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Service::Default::UnknownCustomer
ConfigItem.Description: Allows default services to be selected also for non existing customers.

ConfigItem.Name: PublicFrontend::Module###PublicSupportDataCollector
ConfigItem.Description: Frontend module registration for the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Frontend::Module###AgentTicketPhone
ConfigItem.Description: Frontend module registration for the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Frontend::Module###AgentTicketEmail
ConfigItem.Description: Frontend module registration for the agent interface.

NavBar.Description: Create new email ticket and send this out (outbound)
NavBar.Name: New email ticket

ConfigItem.Name: Frontend::Module###AdminCloudServices
ConfigItem.Description: Frontend module registration for the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Frontend::Module###AdminRegistration
ConfigItem.Description: Frontend module registration for the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Frontend::Module###AdminOTRSBusiness
ConfigItem.Description: Frontend module registration for the agent interface.

NavBarModule.Name: OTRS Business Solution™
NavBarModule.Description: Deploy and manage OTRS Business Solution™.

ConfigItem.Name: Frontend::Module###KIXBaseAJAXHandler
ConfigItem.Description: Module Registration for the KIXBaseAJAXHandler.

ConfigItem.Name: Frontend::ToolBarModule###4-Ticket::AgentTicketPhone
ConfigItem.Description: Toolbar Item for a shortcut.

ConfigItem.Name: Frontend::ToolBarModule###4-Ticket::AgentTicketPhone
ConfigItem.Description: Toolbar Item for a shortcut.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::MenuModule###210-Print
ConfigItem.Description: Shows a link in the menu to print a ticket or an article in the ticket zoom view of the agent interface. Additional access control to show or not show this link can be done by using Key "Group" and Content like "rw:group1;move_into:group2". To cluster menu items use for Key "ClusterName" and for the Content any name you want to see in the UI. Use "ClusterPriority" to configure the order of a certain cluster within the toolbar.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::MenuModule###220-Edit
ConfigItem.Description: Shows a link in the menu to edit the ticket in the zoom view of the agent interface. Additional access control to show or not show this link can be done by using Key "Group" and Content like "rw:group1;move_into:group2". To cluster menu items use for Key "ClusterName" and for the Content any name you want to see in the UI. Use "ClusterPriority" to configure the order of a certain cluster within the toolbar.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::MenuModule###420-Note
ConfigItem.Description: Shows a link in the menu to add a note in the ticket zoom view of the agent interface. Additional access control to show or not show this link can be done by using Key "Group" and Content like "rw:group1;move_into:group2". To cluster menu items use for Key "ClusterName" and for the Content any name you want to see in the UI. Use "ClusterPriority" to configure the order of a certain cluster within the toolbar.

Hash.Item: Add a note to this ticket

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::MenuModule###315-AddtlITSMField
ConfigItem.Description: Shows a link in the menu to modify additional ITSM fields in the ticket zoom view of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::MenuModule###420-Decision
ConfigItem.Description: Shows a link in the menu to change the decision of a ticket in its zoom view of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::MenuModule###440-Pending
ConfigItem.Description: Shows a link in the menu to set a ticket as pending in the ticket zoom view of the agent interface. Additional access control to show or not show this link can be done by using Key "Group" and Content like "rw:group1;move_into:group2". To cluster menu items use for Key "ClusterName" and for the Content any name you want to see in the UI. Use "ClusterPriority" to configure the order of a certain cluster within the toolbar.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::MenuModule###450-Close
ConfigItem.Description: Shows a link in the menu to close a ticket in the ticket zoom view of the agent interface. Additional access control to show or not show this link can be done by using Key "Group" and Content like "rw:group1;move_into:group2". To cluster menu items use for Key "ClusterName" and for the Content any name you want to see in the UI. Use "ClusterPriority" to configure the order of a certain cluster within the toolbar.

ConfigItem.Name: DashboardBackend###0000-KIXNotify
ConfigItem.Description: Parameters for the dashboard backend. "Group" are used to restriced access to the plugin (e. g. Group: admin;group1;group2;). "Default" means if the plugin is enabled per default or if the user needs to enable it manually. "CacheTTLLocal" means the cache time in minutes for the plugin.

ConfigItem.Name: DashboardBackend###0000-ProductNotify
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the parameters for the dashboard backend. "Group" is used to restrict access to the plugin (e. g. Group: admin;group1;group2;). "Default" indicates if the plugin is enabled by default or if the user needs to enable it manually. "CacheTTLLocal" defines the cache expiration period in minutes for the plugin.

ConfigItem.Name: DashboardBackend###0405-News
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the parameters for the dashboard backend. "Limit" defines the number of entries displayed by default. "Group" is used to restrict access to the plugin (e. g. Group: admin;group1;group2;). "Default" indicates if the plugin is enabled by default or if the user needs to enable it manually. "CacheTTL" indicates the cache expiration period in minutes for the plugin.

ConfigItem.Name: DashboardBackend###0270-TicketQueueOverview
ConfigItem.Description: Parameters for the dashboard backend of the queue overview widget of the agent interface. "Group" is used to restrict the access to the plugin (e. g. Group: admin;group1;group2;). "QueuePermissionGroup" is not mandatory, queues are only listed if they belong to this permission group if you enable it. "States" is a list of states, the key is the sort order of the state in the widget. "Default" determines if the plugin is enabled by default or if the user needs to enable it manually. "CacheTTLLocal" is the cache time in minutes for the plugin.

Hash.Item: Provides a matrix overview of the tickets per state per queue.

ConfigItem.Name: DashboardBackend###0901-SearchTemplate01
ConfigItem.Description: Parameters for the dashboard backend of the search template tickets overview of the agent interface. "Limit" is the number of entries shown by default. "Group" is used to restrict the access to the plugin (e. g. Group: admin;group1;group2;). "Default" determines if the plugin is enabled by default or if the user needs to enable it manually. "CacheTTLLocal" is the cache time in minutes for the plugin.

ConfigItem.Name: DashboardBackend###0901-SearchTemplate02
ConfigItem.Description: Parameters for the dashboard backend of the search template tickets overview of the agent interface. "Limit" is the number of entries shown by default. "Group" is used to restrict the access to the plugin (e. g. Group: admin;group1;group2;). "Default" determines if the plugin is enabled by default or if the user needs to enable it manually. "CacheTTLLocal" is the cache time in minutes for the plugin.

ConfigItem.Name: DashboardBackend###0901-SearchTemplate03
ConfigItem.Description: Parameters for the dashboard backend of the search template tickets overview of the agent interface. "Limit" is the number of entries shown by default. "Group" is used to restrict the access to the plugin (e. g. Group: admin;group1;group2;). "Default" determines if the plugin is enabled by default or if the user needs to enable it manually. "CacheTTLLocal" is the cache time in minutes for the plugin.

ConfigItem.Description: Parameters for the dashboard backend of the search template tickets overview of the agent interface. "Limit" is the number of entries shown by default. "Group" is used to restrict the access to the plugin (e. g. Group: admin;group1;group2;). "Default" determines if the plugin is enabled by default or if the user needs to enable it manually. "CacheTTLLocal" is the cache time in minutes for the plugin.

ConfigItem.Description: Parameters for the dashboard backend of the search template tickets overview of the agent interface. "Limit" is the number of entries shown by default. "Group" is used to restrict the access to the plugin (e. g. Group: admin;group1;group2;). "Default" determines if the plugin is enabled by default or if the user needs to enable it manually. "CacheTTLLocal" is the cache time in minutes for the plugin.

ConfigItem.Name: AgentCustomerInformationCenter::Backend###0901-CIC-SearchTemplate01
ConfigItem.Description: Parameters for the dashboard backend of the search template tickets overview of the agent interface. "Limit" is the number of entries shown by default. "Group" is used to restrict the access to the plugin (e. g. Group: admin;group1;group2;). "Default" determines if the plugin is enabled by default or if the user needs to enable it manually. "CacheTTLLocal" is the cache time in minutes for the plugin.

ConfigItem.Description: Parameters for the dashboard backend of the search template tickets overview of the agent interface. "Limit" is the number of entries shown by default. "Group" is used to restrict the access to the plugin (e. g. Group: admin;group1;group2;). "Default" determines if the plugin is enabled by default or if the user needs to enable it manually. "CacheTTLLocal" is the cache time in minutes for the plugin.

ConfigItem.Name: AgentCustomerInformationCenter::Backend###0903-CIC-SearchTemplate03
ConfigItem.Description: Parameters for the dashboard backend of the search template tickets overview of the agent interface. "Limit" is the number of entries shown by default. "Group" is used to restrict the access to the plugin (e. g. Group: admin;group1;group2;). "Default" determines if the plugin is enabled by default or if the user needs to enable it manually. ConfigItem.Name: AgentCustomerInformationCenter::Backend###0904-CIC-SearchTemplate04
ConfigItem.Description: Parameters for the dashboard backend of the search template tickets overview of the agent interface. "Limit" is the number of entries shown by default. "Group" is used to restrict the access to the plugin (e. g. Group: admin;group1;group2;). "Default" determines if the plugin is enabled by default or if the user needs to enable it manually. ConfigItem.Name: AgentITSMConfigItemZoomBackend###0130-LinkGraph
ConfigItem.Description: Defines parameters for the AgentITSMConfigItemZoomTab "LinkGraph".

Hash.Item: Shows this object in its relation to other linked CIs

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::MenuModule###750-PhoneTicket
ConfigItem.Description: Shows a link in the menu to create a phone ticket.

ConfigItem.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::MenuModule###760-EmailTicket
ConfigItem.Description: Shows a link in the menu to create an email ticket.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketNote###Permission
ConfigItem.Description: Required permissions to use the ticket note screen in the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketNote###RequiredLock
ConfigItem.Description: Defines if a ticket lock is required in the ticket note screen of the agent interface (if the ticket isn't locked yet, the ticket gets locked and the current agent will be set automatically as its owner).

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketNote###TicketType
ConfigItem.Description: Sets the ticket type in the ticket note screen of the agent interface (Ticket::Type needs to be activated).

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketNote###Service
ConfigItem.Description: Sets the service in the ticket note screen of the agent interface (Ticket::Service needs to be activated).

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketNote###Queue
ConfigItem.Description: Sets the queue in the ticket note screen of a zoomed ticket in the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketNote###Owner
ConfigItem.Description: Sets the ticket owner in the ticket note screen of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketNote###Responsible
ConfigItem.Description: Sets the responsible agent of the ticket in the ticket note screen of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketNote###State
ConfigItem.Description: If a note is added by an agent, sets the state of a ticket in the ticket note screen of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketNote###Priority
ConfigItem.Description: Shows the ticket priority options in the ticket note screen of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketNote###Title
ConfigItem.Description: Shows the title fields in the ticket note screen of the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: TemplateGenerator::LevelSeparator
ConfigItem.Description: Setup the separator used for splitting the structures handled in templategenerator.
